home.title: Hi, I'm
home.subtitle: I am a frontend developer specialized in Vue 2 and Vue 3 with experience in planning, management, and web system migration. I have skills in UI improvement with custom components using tools like Vuetify 3 and Bootstrap 5. I have been responsible for version control with GitHub and Scrum project management.
home.pitchTitle: Looking for someone for your next project?
home.pitchBody: I focus on creating fast, accessible products with polished UX, using the latest technologies like Vue 3, React, and TypeScript.

ikusi.desc: Planning, management, and migration of a web system from Vue 2 to Vue 3 using tools such as Composition API, Pinia, and Vite. UI improvement implementing custom Vuetify 3 components. Responsible for frontend version control administration with GitHub. Use of Scrum methodology with Jira.

taag.desc: Collaborated on the development of a web system in Vue 2, using Vuetify for responsive design. Consumed APIs with AXIOS and AJAX. Implemented Vuex, Vue Router, and I18n. Designed mockups with Figma. Version control with GitHub and testing with Postman.

tdm.desc: Web system development using Vue 2 with TypeScript. Version control management with Bitbucket (trunk-based) and SCRUM methodology. MVC pattern and Clean Architecture. Backend services with Node.js and Express, PostgreSQL database.

exos.desc: Responsive web system development with Quasar Framework. Form validation with Vuelidate and API consumption with Axios. Use of GitHub and Trello with SCRUM methodology. Implementation of MVC pattern.
